MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY7 postcode area of Glenrothes. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:34am. Our team have been made aware of a grounded overhead power line in the Markinch area and due to the extent of the repairs required we are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:26am on Friday, 4th December 2020
